#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long t, n, x, sm, smm;
	scanf("%lld" , &t);
	while (t--) {
		scanf("%lld" , &n);
		long long m = 99999999;
		sm = 0;
		smm = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			scanf("%lld" , &x);
			sm += x;
			smm += x;
			if (sm > 0) {
				sm = 0;
			}
			m = min(sm, m);
		}
		printf("%lld\n" ,  (smm - 2 * m));
	}
	return 0;
}
